attributes.action: admit the nation has lost confidence in him and his Government, and that he call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, the residents of Great Britain, wish for our feelings to be known that we have lost confidence in this PM and his Governments running of our nation, and we feel a general election should be called. 

With rising petrol prices, the NHS in near collapse and the rest of the problems the country faces, we feel that the government in power is no longer fit and that a general election would allow a better suited government to be brought in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
